Header.title:
We are 
 Donkey Hole
Header.paragraph: History's first NFT project dedicated to donkey buttholes.

paragraphs: When presented an image, most humans tend to look at the subject's face or eyes first. If you saw the picture to the left and instead looked at this donkey's butthole, then congratulations, you're one of us.

Donkey Hole is an NFT project dedicated exclusively to, well, donkey holes, specifically, donkey buttholes. The first collection's mint date is scheduled for sometime around Christ's (Jesus) birthday, 2021, and will feature 8,888 pieces of generative NFT art composed of hand-drawn attributes, one of which, is butthole.
We took great pleasure out of forcing our artist to painstakingly render images of butthole after butthole, which resulted in this list of attributes of varying rarity.

Team.name: @hardscarf
Team.bio: hardscarf is an AI software engineer with mild arthritis who is fascinated with blockchains' potential to create rich lives in the metaverse. As a child he often cried when he saw dead animals, so he is very excited to be part of a project that champions one.

Team.name: @steakdaddy
Team.bio: steak is the visionary behind Donkey Hole and an experienced community manager, as well as a former adult film star. As a child, he often tormented animals and people for fun, but has since fortunately grown out of the habit. He has always loved buttholes, and has made quite a bit of money from them in the past.

Team.name: @jailbaitpony
Team.bio: jailbaitpony is the reluctant artist behind Donkey Hole. She was more or less coerced into this project initially, but has since begun to really believe in it. Could be a classic case of Stockholm. While her name is jailbaitpony, she would prefer her age to remain confidential. And for that matter her gender as well. In fact, she would prefer you don't think about her at all.
